channel.title: HLS on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in HLS on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] What I learned by making a python script to record radiko while reading the code of the predecessors
item.description: ## Summary Various people were writing the code when I searched because I wanted to record Radiko. I could have just run git clone, but I was wondering what kind of processing it was doing, so I tried writing the code myself while reading the code of the predecessors. As I tried it, I learned something, so I summarized it. Protocol called hls (HTTP Live Streaming) used by Radiko Processing that is performed when listening to programs on Radiko How to check the processing whose specifications are not published What you have learned in summary Tested environment OS: Mac OS 10.
